page.title: 14LANDSCAPE
page.content: THE AREA SURROUNDING WOODHALL SPA IS GENERALLY COMPOSED OF A CLAY AND STONE GROUND STRUCTURE.THE FARMERS GROW SEVERAL TYPES OF CROP,INCLUDING WHEAT, BARLEY,POTATOES,CARROTS,CABBAGES,OIL- SEED-RAPE AND SUGAR-BEET.OIL-SEED-RAPE IS A VERY NEW AND PROFITABLE CROP, WHICH IS USED IN THE PRODUCTION OF MARGARINE AND COOKING OIL. SLUGS EAT MANY OF THE CROPS AND TO COUNTER- ACT THESE VERMIN EXPENSIVE MACHINERY IS NEEDED.THERE ARE ALOT OF ARABLE FARMS.DURING THE SUMMER IT IS QUITE OFTEN NECESSARY IN SOME AREAS TO IRRIGATE THE LAND TO MAKE SURE THE CROPS DONT DRY UP. EVERY YEAR HARVEST USUALLY TAKES PLACE DURING JULY AND AUGUST.AND THIS IS THE BUSIEST TIME OF YEAR.THE FARM USES MANY SOPHISTICATED AND EXPENSIVE MACHINES. .
